Our Services

Web Development

Your website is a window for your organisation; it allows you to be discovered by thousand of clients all over the world; a website pushes your organisation beyond your established local community, your physical location and your organic opportunities.

We develop websites for organisations and individuals to cater for the needs that websites can help solve.

Read more

Application Development

From brand promotion to learning more about your consumer base, there's almost no limit to how much utility you can get from apps.

We build mobile apps and desktop applications which employ modern cutting edge technologies; thus affording you and your users the latest features and app capabilities.

Read more

Hosting and Maintenance

We take care of all or most of the aforementioned technical tasks for you. We have a fleet of servers at your service; all this is intended to save you the hastle of server administration. We have a team of engineers, who deal with everything from system upgrades and security issues to data backups and hardware replacement.

Read more

About Us

Creative Design

One of our goals is to produce visually appealing software applications which give you an unmatched edge in the eyes of your prospective audience.

We are an excellent company that can accomplish all of your needs from creating a website or application which matches your brand image and captivates the user, to something which will navigate with no trouble, rank well on search engines, function the same across your complete user-base, and eventually lead to more conversions in your market.

Strategic Solutions

Our development process is agile. At every stage of an application development project, we move forward with a laser focus on results. With an agile approach, we promise cost-effective and timely solutions for every single client.

Great work by great people is at the heart of everything we do. Our team sees your upcoming project as an opportunity to help you achieve your vision. You'll work closely to turn complexity into a competitive advantage.

Consultation & Advisory

Kickoff your application development project with an expert touch. We leverage our proven process and frameworks and assess your goals and capabilities to create a cohesive strategy and roadmap. By aligning and optimizing your resources, we help you build a business case for a new application and accelerate the entire project.

Our methodology pulls together a small team of your SMEs and applies their subjective inputs in a structured environment, facilitated by our highly-experienced Application Portfolio Architects.

Performant Solution For Any Business

Technology can unlock massive advantages for businesses in every industry. Our business and IT consulting experts will help you design, develop, and implement industry-specific solutions to sharpen your competitive edge.

The right integration platforms and tools allow organizations to create reusable, flexible, standards-based connectors for applications and data sources. Companies can confidently plug into their new systems and begin working with them rather than constantly building or rebuilding every integration when new technology is introduced.

Learn More About Us

Our Features

Custom Design

We build custom software which is viable solution because we are the right kind of people who provide you with highly customized flexible solutions that are easy to use and maintain.

Developing a software solution specifically for your company ensures that it is tailored to suit your needs. In fact, during the process of building custom software, there are several opportunities to optimize your processes, which leads to higher productivity for your organization.

learn more ⇾

Advanced Capabilities

Today's enterprise IT demands are more complex than ever; we pride ourselves in assisting organisations run their software and applications. Keeping up with digitalization and automation is key for technology and business leaders.

Organizations have to contend with escalated customer demands and partner expectations. We assist organizations use information technology to deal with the rising number of systems, channels, and data sources. More often, legacy systems get left in the dust quickly — particularly if they were built without the modern enterprise in mind.

Working with Pace Dream means partnering with experts in application development for the modern enterprise. We dig through the complexity with you, coming through with applications that will truly transform your business.

learn more ⇾

Industry Specific Solutions

We build digital solutions designed specifically for a niche market or industry. We believe every business is unique, but not all businesses need an expensive custom software solution. As an alternative, we help businesses use industry-specific software that often helps meet unique operational needs of companies within the same industry.

That way, you can get your hands on unique software features that directly apply to your operations, without having to invest large amounts of money on developing a customized software solution to address the needs of your market.

learn more ⇾

About Us

In 2022 we began our journey of taking organisations and individuals online. Because of our unique approach to the world of software applications development, the project kept evolving.

What started out as a simple developer shop, quickly evolved into a fast growing Software company that helps hundreds of organisations with development, maintenance and hosting of their software applications on an unprecedented basis; our company delivers software applications to millions of users aroud Uganda.

We take pride in being at the forefront of the rise of digital technologies in Uganda.
